T02D3412:77a-1: a'arya kharsa p'a ni s'a dha nam /
T02D3412:77a-3: 'phags pa mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3412:77a-4: 'phags pa mkha' spyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3412:77a-5: sdug bsngal can gyi mgon gyur pa'i //
T02D3412:77a-6: mgon po mkha' spyod la phyag 'tshal //
T02D3412:77a-7: de yi sgrub thabs bsdus pa las //
T02D3412:77a-8: cung zad rgyas par bri bar bya //
T02D3412:77a-9: dang po re zhig sngags pas rkang pa dang /
T02D3412:77a-10: lag pa la sogs pa chus bkrus shing mchog tu
T02D3412:77a-11: gtsang bar byas nas ri phug skye bos dben par
T02D3412:77a-12: gnas te / kha bsang bar bya'o //
T02D3412:77a-13: kha cig nas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su 'jam zhing yangs pa'i gdan la nye bar 'dug nas /
T02D3412:77a-14: rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig dang po yongs su
T02D3412:77a-15: gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yid kyis bsam
T02D3412:77a-16: par bya ste / de'i dbus su ston ka'i zla
T02D3412:77a-17: ba brgya'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba rab tu 'bar
T02D3412:77a-18: ba'i hr'i:yig gi sa bon blta bar bya'o //
T02D3412:77a-19: de nas yang hr'i:yig gi sa bon las 'phros te /
T02D3412:77a-20: 'gro ba rnams kyis ma rig pa'i mun pa 'joms
T02D3412:77a-21: par byed cing 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i rnam par
T02D3412:77a-22: 'phros te / phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten
T02D3412:77a-23: gyi khams na bzhugs pa rnams thams cad snang bar
T02D3412:77a-24: 'phros te / mdzad nas / de na bzhugs pa'i
T02D3412:77a-25: yang grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bla ma dang
T02D3412:77a-26: 'phros te / mdzad nas / / sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3412:77a-27: byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D3412:77a-28: phyi nas de rnams nam mkha'i phyogs su 'khod cing /
T02D3412:77a-29: mchog gi snying rje dang ldan pa'i bla ma dang /
T02D3412:77a-31: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la me tog dang /
T02D3412:77a-42: ba dan la sogs pa shin tu phul du byung ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pas mchod cing /
T02D3412:77a-45: skye ba gzhan rnams su thog ma dang tha ma
T02D3412:77b-0: @77b med pa'i 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye gnas
T02D3412:77b-1: rnams su bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis
T02D3412:77b-2: kyang sdig pa'i las ci bgyis pa dang /
T02D3412:77b-4: rjes su yi rang bar bgyis pa de rnams thams
T02D3412:77b-5: cad 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po bcom ldan 'das
T02D3412:77b-6: spro ba chen po rnams dang /
T02D3412:77b-8: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D3412:77b-9: cho ga 'dis so sor bshags shing slar yang mi
T02D3412:77b-10: byed pa'i sdom pa 'dzin cing bsod nams la rjes
T02D3412:77b-11: su yi rang bar bya ste /
T02D3412:77b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D3412:77b-16: gang zhig 'jig rten gsum na mchis pa'i dge ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D3412:77b-17: de'i rjes su dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya ste /
T02D3412:77b-18: rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3412:77b-19: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3412:77b-20: tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3412:77b-21: phyi nas lam la brten pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D3412:77b-22: rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i lam la bdag gis bsten gyi
T02D3412:77b-24: de nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D3412:77b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang de'i sras byang
T02D3412:77b-26: chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yongs su mya
T02D3412:77b-27: ngan las mi 'da' zhing 'khor ba ma stongs kyi
T02D3412:77b-28: bar du sems can gyi don mdzad du gsol /
T02D3412:77b-29: de'i rjes su bskul ma gdab par bya ste /
T02D3412:77b-30: rnam pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
T02D3412:77b-31: gshegs pa rnams kyis bla na med pa'i chos gsung
T02D3412:77b-32: bzhin bstan pas gang gis myur du sems can rnams
T02D3412:77b-33: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting mtha' med pa las bsgral
T02D3412:77b-34: du gsol / gsol ba btab pa'i rjes su de nas bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D3412:77b-35: bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun gyis
T02D3412:77b-36: mchod nas gang de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba
T02D3412:77b-37: bskyed pa rnams de bzhin du bdag gis rdzogs pa'i
T02D3412:77b-38: byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
T02D3412:77b-39: yang na bsdus nas bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun gsungs te /
T02D3412:77b-40: tshigs su bcad pa 'di bklag par bya'o //
T02D3412:77b-41: lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang bgyis pa'i //
T02D3412:78a-0: sdig rnams rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar @78a * //
T02D3412:78a-2: 'jig rten gsum gyi dge ba thams cad la //
T02D3412:78a-3: rab tu dga' bas rtag tu rjes yi rang //
T02D3412:78a-4: dkon mchog gsum la brtag tu bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D3412:78a-5: rgyal ba'i gsung la skyabs shing bsten par bgyi //
T02D3412:78a-6: ji srid srid pa brtan gyur de srid du //
T02D3412:78a-7: skye dgu'i yab rnams mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
T02D3412:78a-8: 'dir yang rtag tu sems can don mdzad cing //
T02D3412:78a-9: sangs rgyas sras bcas de rnams bzhugs su gsol //
T02D3412:78a-10: the tshom mthar byed ji lta ba yi chos //
T02D3412:78a-11: kye kye mthu chen po khyod kyis bstan du gsol //
T02D3412:78a-12: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'gro rnams lhan cig der //
T02D3412:78a-13: gang gis pha rol 'gro zhing bde bsags pa //
T02D3412:78a-14: bsod nams rab tu gang bsags 'di kun kyang //
T02D3412:78a-15: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag gis bsngo bar bgyi //
T02D3412:78a-16: rgyal ba rnams dang de yi sras //
T02D3412:78a-17: bdag dang 'gro ba'i bla ma la //
T02D3412:78a-18: bdag gis dngos po thams cad ni //
T02D3412:78a-19: thams cad du ni dbul bar bgyi //
T02D3412:78a-20: zhes pa 'dis mchod pa rnam pa bdun gyis mchod nas /
T02D3412:78a-21: aom a'a:h'um mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol /
T02D3412:78a-22: de nas tshad med pa bzhi ni byams pa dang /
T02D3412:78a-25: btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid rnams ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3412:78a-26: de la 'dir byams pas ni sems can thams cad la shin tu phan par byed cing /
T02D3412:78a-27: bu gcig pa ltar mnyes gshin pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D3412:78a-29: gting mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i nang du
T02D3412:78a-30: lhung ba'i mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams bdag
T02D3412:78a-31: gis yang dag par gdon par 'dod pa'i bsam pa
T02D3412:78a-32: can no // yang dga' ba ni ci 'dra na /
T02D3412:78a-33: khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang gang
T02D3412:78a-34: zhig legs par spyod pa de rnams la de'i longs
T02D3412:78a-35: spyod kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams la sems
T02D3412:78a-36: dga' ba'o // gang 'dir btang snyoms ni khong khro ba dang /
T02D3412:78a-37: rjes su brtse ba dag nges par bcings shing phan pa dang /
T02D3412:78a-38: gnod par byed pa spangs nas sems can rnams la mchog tu phan par spyod pa ste /
T02D3412:78a-39: tshad med pa bzhi sgom zhing /
T02D3412:78a-40: de nas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3412:78a-41: chos thams cad 'di bzhin du rang bzhin ngo bo
T02D3412:78a-42: nyid med cing yongs su dag pa'o zhes pa la
T02D3412:78b-0: @78b 'di bzhin du chos thams cad rang bzhin yongs su dag cing /
T02D3412:78b-1: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes pa 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02D3412:78b-2: chos thams cad rang bzhin yongs su dag pa la gsar du sgrib par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D3412:78b-4: gzhan 'dir 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba de bzhin
T02D3412:78b-5: du gang las 'gyur ba ni 'khor ba'i rgyu 'dod
T02D3412:78b-6: chags la sogs pa'i dri ma sna tshogs pa'i phyir
T02D3412:78b-7: slar yang chos thams cad kyis ji ltar med par
T02D3412:78b-8: 'gyur na / khyad par du 'phags pa'i lam bsgom pa des 'gog ste /
T02D3412:78b-9: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gog pa mngon du bya zhes so //
T02D3412:78b-10: de'i phyir na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs
T02D3412:78b-11: su dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig
T02D3412:78b-13: 'dir mang po smras pas ci zhig bya /
T02D3412:78b-14: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir /
T02D3412:78b-15: chos thams cad stong pa nyid do zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3412:78b-16: de la 'dir stong pa nyid ni yid tsam gyis
T02D3412:78b-17: de bzhin du 'dir de dang de'i rnam pas bdag
T02D3412:78b-18: nyid snang zhing so sor gsal bar bya ste /
T02D3412:78b-19: dper na rmi lam bzhin no //
T02D3412:78b-20: phyi rol du yid kyis gzung ba med de yid kyis so //
T02D3412:78b-21: gzung ba'i dngos po med na 'dzin pa'i yid kyang med do //
T02D3412:78b-22: de'i phyir chos thams cad kyang yid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D3412:78b-23: de rnams kyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs
T02D3412:78b-24: pa'i rtog pa'i spros pa mtha' dag ji snyed pa
T02D3412:78b-25: / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D3412:78b-26: 'di'i don gnyis su med pa'i snang ba tsam gyi bdag nyid du g-yo ba dang /
T02D3412:78b-27: mi g-yo ba'i 'gro ba thams cad bsam par bya'o //
T02D3412:78b-28: 'dir de bzhin du stong pa nyid ni /
T02D3412:78b-29: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bha wa
T02D3412:78b-30: a'atma ko& ham zhes pa'i sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab
T02D3412:78b-31: par bya'o // ri dags kyis mtshan pa'i dri ma
T02D3412:78b-32: dang bral ba'i mtshan mor byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3412:78b-33: steng du shin tu dkar zhing dkar ba'i hr'i:yig gi
T02D3412:78b-34: sa bon las bcom ldan 'das dpal ldan mkha' la
T02D3412:78b-35: gshegs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug ston ka'i zla ba
T02D3412:78b-36: dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor brgya shar pa ltar
T02D3412:78b-37: shin tu dkar ba'i sku can /
T02D3412:78b-38: mchog tu sgeg pa'i nyams 'bar zhing yid du 'ong ba /
T02D3412:78b-39: rin po che sna tshogs pa la sogs pas brgyan cing rnam par spras pa'i sku mnga' ba /
T02D3412:79a-1: dkar po rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ba /
T02D3412:79a-2: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa rgyal ba'i rin po ches dbu rnam par mdzes pa /
T02D3412:79a-3: gangs kyi bye ma'i chus bkrus pa bzhin dkar ba'i na bza' sku la bsnams pa /
T02D3412:79a-4: shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad tsam pa'i shin tu yid
T02D3412:79a-5: du 'ong ba'i chu skyes dkar po'i steng na gnas
T02D3412:79a-6: pa'i ri dags kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'i zla
T02D3412:79a-7: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la skyil krung phyed pas
T02D3412:79a-8: bzhugs pa / phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin /
T02D3412:79a-9: g-yon pa yid 'phrog pa'i padma dkar po kha 'bus pa bsnams pa /
T02D3412:79a-10: de lta bur gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi sku bdag nyid bskyed cing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3412:79a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs logs su 'phags ma sgrol ma dang nor bzangs so //
T02D3412:79a-12: g-yon phyogs logs su khro gnyer can dang rta mgrin bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
T02D3412:79a-13: mgo bor dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom yig go //
T02D3412:79a-14: de'i rjes su mgrin par dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a'a:yig go //
T02D3412:79a-15: snying gar dri ma med pa'i ku mu ta'i gnyen
T02D3412:79a-16: gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um yig blta bar
T02D3412:79a-17: bya'o // de'i rim pa 'dis ji srid 'dod kyi bar de srid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3412:79a-18: de'i rjes la de bzhin du dam tshig sems dpa'i
T02D3412:79a-19: gzugs kyis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mgon po'i thugs
T02D3412:79a-20: kar ri dags kyi mtshan ma dang bral zhing dri
T02D3412:79a-21: ma med pa'i ri bong 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D3412:79a-22: steng du smin drug gi zla ba 'am /
T02D3412:79a-23: kun da'i mdog lta bu'i hr'i:yig gi sa bon las
T02D3412:79a-24: skyes pa'i 'od zer khor yug gi mthar thug par
T02D3412:79a-25: 'phros te / 'jig rten gsum gyi mi shes pa'i mun pa bcom par gyur nas /
T02D3412:79a-26: thog ma med pa nas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i
T02D3412:79a-27: bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i sku shin tu
T02D3412:79a-28: ring po nas nam mkha'i phyogs su gdan drangs shing
T02D3412:79a-29: bkug ste / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das mdun
T02D3412:79a-30: gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su bzhugs nas rin po che
T02D3412:79a-31: sna tshogs pas spras pa'i gser gyi snod du dri
T02D3412:79a-33: dri zhim po'i me tog bcug ste /
T02D3412:79a-34: des de bzhin du gdan drangs pa'i ye shes sems
T02D3412:79a-35: dpa'i sku bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mgon po'i zhabs
T02D3412:79b-0: de'i rjes su lha'i me @79b tog dang /
T02D3412:79b-12: ba dan la sogs pa rnams kyis phyi dang /
T02D3412:79b-14: phyi rol gyi sna tshogs pa'i rim pas de bzhin
T02D3412:79b-15: du bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i bdag nyid
T02D3412:79b-17: slar yang mngon par mchod cing bstod nas dza:h'um bam
T02D3412:79b-18: ho:zhes pa'i yi ge bzhi po 'di'i phyag rgya blta
T02D3412:79b-19: bar bya'o // cung zad thal mo gug por sbyar nas gung mo rtse mor byas te /
T02D3412:79b-20: sor mo'i lhag ma rnams cung zad kha bsdus shing kha mngon du byas te /
T02D3412:79b-21: cung zad ma reg par gzung bar bya'o //
T02D3412:79b-22: mthe bo dang mdzub mo dag nye bar gnas shing chu skyes kha bye ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3412:79b-23: phyag rgya 'dis de bzhin du gdan drangs nas bcom
T02D3412:79b-24: ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i mtshan nyid yongs su
T02D3412:79b-26: yang dam tshig sems dpa'i gzugs la bcom ldan 'das nang du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3412:79b-27: aom a'a:h'um zhes pa 'dis gnyis su med pa 'di dag nyid lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D3412:79b-28: de'i rjes la ri dags kyi mtshan ma dang bral
T02D3412:79b-29: ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thim zhing
T02D3412:79b-30: / dri ma med pa'i rtse'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3412:79b-31: brgya'i 'od zer gyi tshogs 'bar ba'i hr'i:yig gi sa
T02D3412:79b-32: bon las rnam par 'phros nas grangs med gzhal du
T02D3412:79b-33: med pa'i bcom ldan 'das dpal kharsa p'a ni 'jig
T02D3412:79b-34: rten dbang phyug rje btsun phyogs bcu nas byon zhing
T02D3412:79b-35: dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nam
T02D3412:79b-37: yang de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gser dang /
T02D3412:79b-43: aindra n'i la la sogs pa'i rin po che'i char phab nas /
T02D3412:79b-44: dbul ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bcom zhing /
T02D3412:79b-45: bla na med pa'i dpal 'byor la bkod nas /
T02D3412:79b-46: bdag med pa la sogs pa'i chos gsungs pas bdud
T02D3412:79b-47: rtsi'i rgyun bab pa des yang dag par tshim par
T02D3412:79b-48: byas nas slar yang rgyun mi 'chad par sna tshogs
T02D3412:79b-50: gzhan gyi don mdzad nas 'gro pa rnams kyang bcom
T02D3412:79b-51: ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bskyed
T02D3412:80a-1: bsil zer byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su shel dang /
T02D3412:80a-2: nor bu'i 'od zer phreng ba lta bu'i hr'i:yig gi sa bon bkod nas /
T02D3412:80a-3: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag par zhugs par gyur te /
T02D3412:80a-4: de lta bu la sogs pa spro ba dang bsdu
T02D3412:80a-5: ba'i rim pas ji srid ngal bar ma gyur pa
T02D3412:80a-6: de srid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3412:80a-7: de nas yang bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3412:80a-9: aom hr'i:sv'a h'a sngags gang bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
T02D3412:80a-10: mgon po'i snying po thun mong ma yin pa'i mthu
T02D3412:80a-11: dang ldan pa de dag gis de bzhin du sngags
T02D3412:80a-13: thams cad kyis de bzhin du rgyal ba mchog rnams
T02D3412:80a-14: kyis mngon par mchod pas bkur sti dang phyag bya'o
T02D3412:80a-15: zhes so // ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'gro
T02D3412:80a-16: ba rnams 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skur blta zhing
T02D3412:80a-17: zhes so // / de'i nga rgyal byas nas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin gnas par bya'o zhes so //
T02D3412:80a-18: cho ga 'dis bcom ldan 'das mang du bsgoms na /
T02D3412:80a-19: ral gri la sogs pa'i dngos grub mtha' dag mngon
T02D3412:80a-20: du byed cing zhabs kyi drung du yang dag par
T02D3412:80a-22: gzhan dngos grub phra mo smos ci dgos te /
T02D3412:80a-24: gang zhig skye bos dben pa'i nags tshal dang /
T02D3412:80a-26: ri'i phug rnams su gnas nas bcom ldan 'das sgom
T02D3412:80a-27: pa de rnams kyis yun mi ring bar de bzhin
T02D3412:80a-28: du 'dir nges par bcom ldan 'das mngon du byed
T02D3412:80a-29: de / bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis de rnams
T02D3412:80a-30: kyi dbugs 'byin pa dang rang tu dbugs 'byin pa
T02D3412:80a-31: la sogs pa ster bar mdzad do //
T02D3412:80a-32: nges par zhugs na mang po smras pas ci zhig bya //
T02D3412:80a-33: mchog tu shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang de rnams kyi lag pa'i mthil na /
T02D3412:80a-34: rag chung gi 'bras bu gzhag pa bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02D3412:80a-35: dpal ldan mkha' spyod 'jig rten mgon //
T02D3412:80a-36: mchog gi sgrub thabs byas pa yis //
